casebody.data:
[Cite as 02/1812004 Case Announcements, 2004-Ohio-703.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

February 18, 2004

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2003-2165. State v. Koliser.

Mahoning C.P. No. 03CR535. This cause is pending before the court as a death penalty appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of Mahoning County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for extension of time to transmit the record,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for extension of time to transmit the record be, and hereby is, granted to the extent that the time for transmitting the record is extended to April 19, 2004.
